metadata.title: What type of motor applications is this device suited for?

sections.content:
Question:
What type of motor applications is this device suited for?
Answer:
The motor control ASSP is suitable to control one motor in one or three shunt configurations, sensor-less or with external feedback, for end applications like home appliances, fans, pumps, compressors, power tools, drone motors and many more.
Suitable Products
RISC-V ASSP
